content: The Beetle Captain fights like all others of its kind. It is armed with two swords that it uses to slash and stab at you. The Beetle Captain also has large, white wings on its back that allow it to fly up into the air and slash you as it crashes back down to the ground. It can also fly up and charge you, stabbing in quick succession with both swords.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Beetle_Captain_Spirit.md", within the section "Beetle Captain Spirit" and the sub-section "Beetle Captain Fight". The content is presented below:

The Beetle Captain fights like all others of its kind. It is armed with two swords that it uses to slash and stab at you. The Beetle Captain also has large, white wings on its back that allow it to fly up into the air and slash you as it crashes back down to the ground. It can also fly up and charge you, stabbing in quick succession with both swords.
